mapper.select: SELECT *,REPLACE((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(mayday_category.category_name) from mayday_category where category_id in(SELECT category_id FROM mayday_article_category WHERE article_id=a.id) ),',',' ') categorys ,REPLACE((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(mayday_tag.tag_name) FROM mayday_tag WHERE tag_id in (SELECT tag_id FROM mayday_article_tag WHERE article_id = a.id)),',',' ') tags FROM mayday_article a WHERE article_status=#{status}
SELECT * FROM mayday_article a WHERE article_status=#{status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mayday_article WHERE article_status=#{status}
mapper.update: update mayday_article set article_status=#{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.user_id,a.article_content,a.article_content_md,a.article_newstime,a.article_summary,a.article_thumbnail,a.article_title,article_type,a.article_comment,a.article_url,GROUP_CONCAT(distinct b.category_id) categorys ,GROUP_CONCAT(distinct c.tag_id) tags FROM mayday_article a INNER JOIN mayday_article_category b INNER JOIN mayday_article_tag c on a.id=b.article_id AND b.article_id=c.article_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
